instruction: Given a Creative Commons song and lyrics, generate a hook for the song.
input:
The song is entitled "It's Time". 

Lyrics:

It's time to move on 
It's time to take control 
No more worries and no more pain 
We will be alright in the end
output:
Come on and show the world you can be strong, 
It's time to step it up and carry on. 
Spread your wings and be ready to fly, 
Let's make it happen, it's time!
